pages.text: When ni bestow mercy popol adversity aflikt them ili tuj scheme our revelations! Dir di scheming est far effective our messengers recording cxio vi scheme

Li est Unu mov vi land mar. Vi get sxip ili vel smoothly nice breeze Tiam while gxoj therein violent vent blov ond surround them cxiu flank. This est when ili implore DI sincerely devoting their prayers Him sol Vi nur sav us this temp ni est eternally appreciative

as baldaux as Li sav them ili transgress ter oppose truth. O popol your transgression est nur al detriment your own anim. Vi ceter preoccupied this worldly life tiam al us est your ultimate return tiam ni inform vi de cxio vi done

analogy this worldly life est this ni send down akv cxiel produkt gxi all kinds da plant el ter proviz food popol best! Tiam just as ter perfectly ornam its popol opini ili est en control thereof our judgment ven nokt tag las gxi completely barren as nothing ekzist previous tag! Ni tiel eksplik revelations popol reflect
(DI INVIT abode PAC DIREKT whoever VOL DIREKT) REKT path
